attributes.action: use the NHS for any medical needs that he or his family have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the government have such faith in the NHS, I would like the Prime Minister to publically commit his healthcare and that of his family to the NHS.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which refer to the PM's family.
reasons: The names of family members of elected representatives or officials of public bodies
